channel.title: Boekie Woekie on PanDam Amsterdam
channel.description: Recent content in Boekie Woekie on PanDam Amsterdam

item.title: Printed and rebel, Amsterdam’s zine scene survives hipsters and tourists
item.description: Photo via: Wikimedia, Author Lindsay Eyink, Licence CC BY 2.0 Wikimedia    Author: W   CC BY 2.0 Lindsay Eyink   Licence  -- Who would ever expect to find an anarchist bookshop in Jodenbreestraat Street, one of the most touristic spots of the capital? And yet there stands Fort of Sjakoo, one of the eldest stores of its kind, packed with shelves full of anarchist, feminist and left-wing political publications; the thoughts of some of the most important thinkers of history lay in ancient books, waiting to be read.
